question: Display the top 3 most frequently commented-on answers.
cypher:
MATCH (a:Answer)<-[:COMMENTED_ON]-(c:Comment)
WITH a, COUNT(c) AS comment_count
ORDER BY comment_count DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN a.link AS answer_link, a.title AS answer_title, comment_count
error: Schema mismatch: Cypher queries COMMENTED_ON relation on Answer entities, but TypeQL schema only defines commented_on relating comment to question, not to answer. Answer entity does not play any role in commented_on relation.

question: Display the top 3 questions that received an answer on the same day they were asked.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)<-[:ANSWERED]-(a:Answer)
WHERE date(datetime({epochSeconds: q.creation_date})) = date(datetime({epochSeconds: a.creation_date}))
WITH q, COUNT(a) AS answer_count
ORDER BY answer_count DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN q.title AS question_title, q.link AS question_link, q.creation_date AS creation_date, answer_count
error: Unsupported: date extraction from epoch timestamps (date(datetime({epochSeconds: ...}))) not available in TypeQL

question: Retrieve the top 3 questions with the most detailed body markdown.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q.title, q.link, q.body_markdown
ORDER BY size(q.body_markdown) DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Unsupported: size() function for string length not available in TypeQL

question: Which users have asked the most questions in the last year?
error: Unsupported: date arithmetic (timestamp() - 31536000 for one year ago calculation)

question: List the 3 questions with the highest scores and their associated tags.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WITH q, t
ORDER BY q.view_count DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN q.title AS question_title, q.view_count AS view_count, collect(t.name) AS tags
error: collect() function not supported in TypeQL - cannot aggregate tags into a list

question: List the top 5 questions with the most answers and their tags.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WITH q, COUNT(t) AS tagCount
ORDER BY q.answer_count DESC, tagCount DESC
LIMIT 5
MATCH (q)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
RETURN q.title AS question_title, q.answer_count AS number_of_answers, COLLECT(t.name) AS tags
error: COLLECT() function is unsupported in TypeQL - cannot aggregate values into an array

question: For the top 3 questions with the lowest view counts, list their associated tags.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WITH q, t
ORDER BY q.view_count ASC
LIMIT 3
RETURN q.title AS question_title, q.view_count AS view_count, collect(t.name) AS tags
error: collect() function is not supported in TypeQL - cannot aggregate tags into an array per question

question: Who are the top 3 users who commented the most on the highest viewed questions?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:COMMENTED_ON]-(c:Comment)<-[:COMMENTED]-(u:User)
WITH q, u, COUNT(c) AS comment_count
ORDER BY q.view_count DESC
LIMIT 3
WITH u, SUM(comment_count) AS total_comments
RETURN u.display_name AS user, total_comments
ORDER BY total_comments DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Requires nested subqueries with two-stage aggregation (first limit to top 3 questions by view_count, then sum comment counts per user). TypeQL 3.0 does not support subqueries or CTEs.

question: For the 3 questions with the most answers, list their associated tags.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WITH q, t
ORDER BY q.answer_count DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN q.title AS question_title, collect(t.name) AS tags
error: Cypher uses collect() to aggregate tags into a list, which is not supported in TypeQL. TypeQL has no equivalent to collect/aggregate into arrays.
